articles.author: Divya A
articles.title: Turkey, Saudi skip registration for Srinagar G20, China stays away - The Indian Express
articles.description: Besides India, the G20 includes Argentina, Australia, Brazil, Canada, China, France, Germany, Indonesia, Italy, Japan, South Korea, Mexico, Russia, Saudi Arabia, South Africa, Turkey, United Kingdom and United States, and the European Union.
articles.content: THREE DAYS before the G20 tourism working group meeting begins in Srinagar on Monday, three countries China, Turkey and Saudi Arabia had not registered till Friday.A PTI report from Beijing quoted Ch… [+2746 chars]
